This award-winning resort has a little something for everyone. Literally steps from the beach, there's plenty of fun on-site. Relax in one of the two indoor or three outdoor pools — including a lazy river and eight hot tubs. Take a break from the sun in the air-conditioned game room or dine at Sea Breeze Café & Bar. And when you're ready, North Myrtle Beach is waiting for you to explore.

Hit the links with a full 18 holes at any of Myrtle Beach's famed golf courses or go a little smaller with some miniature golf. Spend time enjoying South Carolina's beauty at a local park. Catch your dinner at one of the fishing piers. Adrenaline junkies can race to see who's the fastest in go-kart racing. Or enjoy some family time at a water park.

Take a 360° resort tour.

This resort offers you the best of both worlds: more on-site amenities and unit choices than you'd find in most urban area resorts, plus a location convenient to the San Antonio River Walk. It's the ideal blend of resort-style fun and urban excitement.

Club Wyndham La Cascada sits along San Antonio's famous River Walk. Unwind by the pool or take a stroll through the downtown River Walk loop. Local attractions, restaurants, shops, and nightclubs are all within walking distance from the resort. Explore the heart of San Antonio, immersed in a metropolitan scene of art, history, and diverse culture. Marvel at stunning historical architecture on the King William District Tour and experience the famous SAGA show, a spectacle of over 7,000 square feet of colorful light and artistic imagery projected onto the San Fernando Cathedral.

Take a 360° resort tour.

  • Tower was built in 1982 and completely renovated in 2011.
  • Many eateries within a quarter mile; 13 casinos within 5 miles; grocery is 10 miles.
  • During peak seasons there is high elevator traffic, which may cause some delays.
  • Luggage delivery service available for a fee through Bags VIP. Visit SkipToTheTrip.com for more details.
  • This is a non-smoking resort.
  • A credit card is required for the $250 security deposit requested at check in.
  • The resort offers self-parking for a daily fee (*Rates may vary. Owner and non-owner rates are subject to change based on the season and events occurring in the area). Due to limited parking, only one space per unit. Additionally, an overflow parking lot is located adjacent to the resort and used when the resort's garage is full. A parking pass is required. Parking for RVs and oversized vehicles is not available. Please contact the resort for additional details.
  • Due to limited elevator space and access, mandatory luggage valet may be required during peak hours with high arrivals and departures. Due to this amenity, some luggage may take up to an hour after arrival to be delivered to suites. Please plan accordingly. Elevator wait times may be longer during peak season, specifically Sunday mornings due to increased departures and luggage retrieval.
  • A jetted tub is not guaranteed in every one-bedroom and 2-bedroom deluxe suite.

  • Please be aware that due to inventory constraints at this resort, it is possible that your reservation may not guarantee the same suite for all nights. If this occurs, you may be required to relocate to a different suite during your stay.
  • Suite types and size vary by building. Lodging and upgrades are based on availability.
  • 2-bedroom standard suites are not available in the Maples Association.
  • Presidential Reserve Benefits only apply to Presidential Reserve Suites located in the Owls II building. Presidential suites located Owls I and Owl II buildings do not receive Presidential Reserve benefits.
  • On-site shuttle service to resort amenities runs daily from 8 a.m. to 11:15 p.m. in the winter and summer seasons. Shuttle services are not available during the Spring and Fall seasons
  • A mountain shuttle dedicated to transporting skiers and riders from The Welcome Sign in the Village to the upper mountain is offered daily from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. in the winter season.
  • Wi-Fi is available in all suites.
  • The ski season runs from November through April, subject to weather and trail conditions.
  • Access to the Community Center located in your condominium association are available at no charge. You may ONLY access the Community Center you are lodged in. Community Centers are not available at all associations.
  • Many facilities and amenities are available seasonally. Get more information on what's available during your stay.
  • The surrounding terrain at Smugglers' Notch includes unpaved roads and walkways. Most buildings are on the slope or hillside with no elevators and may require multiple flights of stairs.
  • A resort fee will be applied at check-in to all guest of owner reservations. Prices vary by suite size. Please contact the resort for additional information.
    • 1 Bedroom Suite types fee is $45
    • 2 Bedroom Suite types and larger fee is $55
  • The resort check-in time is 5:00 p.m. No Pets Allowed
  • No Pets Allowed
  • Accommodation requests must be submitted to Smugglers' Notch Owner Services Department via email at ownersrv@smuggs.com at least two weeks before arrival for consideration. All accommodations are subject to availability and are not guaranteed.

  • Air conditioning
  • No elevators
  • The resort is at a high elevation of 7500 ft.
  • Front desk hours are 7 a.m. - 11 p.m.
  • If arriving at the resort after 11 p.m., please call the resort to make alternative check-in arrangements before arrival.
  • Parking is limited, and the resort is not able to accommodate the storage of boats, RVs, and trailers.
  • Pool and hot tub hours are 8 a.m.-10 p.m. Outdoor pool is seasonal, closed from fall to spring annually. The hot tub is open year-round. Children who are not fully potty trained must wear swim diapers. There are no lifeguards on duty. Please refer to posted pool signage for more information.
  • Suites with views are indicated as “deluxe.” All other suites have limited views.
  • Washer/dryers are limited to 2- and 3-bedroom suites. Studio and 1-bedroom suites have access to a shared guest laundry room.
  • 1-Bedroom Deluxe A - Spacious walkout basement suite with a door leading directly to the riverbank.
  • 1-Bedroom Deluxe B – Compact suite with balcony overlooking the river.
  • 1-Bedroom – Compact, cozy cottage. Sleeps two comfortably. Limited bathroom vanity counter space. 400 sq. ft.
  • Limited ground floor requests are accepted based on physical or medical needs. Please call the Vacation Planning Center for details.

Nestled on a secluded Caribbean beach at the southern end of the island, this is an idyllic oceanside spot. If you prefer your St. Thomas vacation free of crowds, this resort is the best of both worlds — it’s tucked away with plenty to do on-site, but close to Charlotte Amalie and other island attractions.

  • 1-bedroom suites are smaller compared to similar suites at other Club Wyndham resorts and have no balcony/patio. They can sleep up to four people, but are most suitable for two people. Additionally, the kitchen has a sink, mini fridge and a two-burner stove top.
  • Generous selection of restaurants within 0.5 miles; grocery store 0.25 miles; discount mall 1 mile
  • This is a non-smoking resort
  • Star Island is a cash-free resort; a credit card authorization is required at check-in
  • Resort entry and use of resort amenities are limited to registered guests only. Visiting guests will not be permitted through security.
  • Smoking is prohibited in suites, on balconies, and in common areas. Failure to comply may result in a fee. Four designated smoking areas are available.
  • Minimum check-in age is 21
  • The resort's parking is limited and cannot accommodate large vehicles, boats, campers, RVs, and trailers.

  • Bedding configurations vary and are not guaranteed. Please contact the resort for further details.
  • A credit card is required for the $250 security deposit requested at check in.

This peaceful, wooded resort, just three miles from the Highway 76 Strip, delivers all of Branson in one memorable stay. Think top attractions, theme parks, shops, restaurants, and live entertainment shows all combined with the breathtaking outdoor Ozark beauty. Your resort is only a short drive away from scenic attractions and family-friendly nightlife. Enjoy outdoor adventures like miniature golf, boating, hiking, and fishing. Indulge in waterfront shopping and dining at Branson Landing. Less than fifteen minutes from the resort, Silver Dollar City amusement park offers world-class attractions and entertainment. From coasters and carousels to train rides and water slides, there’s plenty of thrills and fun for the whole family.

A great choice for reunions and other special occasions, you'll enjoy an attractively designed resort with a warm, down-home atmosphere — much like Branson itself. This resort has it all. In addition to a pool, fitness room, spa, and playground, Club Wyndham Branson at The Meadows offers a variety of unique amenities. Enjoy live entertainment, zumba, art classes, water aerobics, movies, bingo, sports and recreation activities, fish feeding, and more. The convenient location provides easy access to popular attractions like Silver Dollar City amusement park, but with so many activities to choose from, you could enjoy an entire vacation without ever leaving the resort.

Take a 360° resort tour.

This celebrated resort blends a storied past with a stylish present. A famed fixture in San Francisco for more than 70 years, classic flair abounds in the renovated and updated space. An enviable location puts the best of the city within easy reach. It’s your ideal address by the bay.

Take a 360° resort tour.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"CA","streetAddress":"750 Sutter Street","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

Start your Bay Area adventure.

","text@ContentType":"text/html","title":"Club Wyndham Canterbury","yextId":"1000373329","zipcode":"94109"},"/content/dam/wyndham/content-fragments/zurb-club-wyndham/resorts/united-states-of-america/california/san-francisco/resort/helpful-hints-club-wyndham-canterbury":{"cq:model":"/conf/wyndham-nextgen/settings/dam/cfm/models/content-model","dam:relativePath":"wyndham/content-fragments/zurb-club-wyndham/resorts/united-states-of-america/california/san-francisco/resort/helpful-hints-club-wyndham-canterbury","jcr:mixinTypes":["dam:cfVariationNode","cq:Taggable"],"jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"
  • Self Parking options include Nexus Garage (840 Sutter St, San Francisco, CA 94109) and Olympic Garage (665 Sutter St, San Francisco, CA 94109). 
  • Valet parking is not available.
    • Nexus garage - $40 per day plus tax. This garage is open from 6:30 am until midnight.
    • Olympic garage - $47 per day plus tax, and oversized vehicles are $90 per day plus tax. The garage is open 24hrs.
  • There is an unloading zone for guests in front of the resort
  • This urban-style resort only offers full kitchens in its Presidential suites. The 1-bedroom suites and the 2-bedroom suite offer an under-the-counter refrigerator and microwave.
  • All standard Presidential and Presidential Reserve suites have a washer/dryer in the suite. Owners staying in any other suite types may utilize the laundry facilities available on select floors.
  • Luggage delivery service available for a fee through Bags VIP. Visit SkipToTheTrip.com for more details.
  • Wireless Internet is free for up to 4 devices, ideal for emails and basic web browsing. For more streaming and surfing options on unlimited devices, Enhanced High-Speed Wireless Internet is available for $9.95 per day, $49.95 for 6-10 days, and $59.95 for 11-30 days.
  • A credit card is required for the $250 security deposit requested at check in.

Play, relax, repeat in the golf capital of America. Luxury meets laid-back at Club Wyndham Dye Villas — a peaceful retreat surrounded by beautiful beaches and four world-class golf courses, designed by professional golfers Greg Norman and Davis Love III and legendary course architects Tom Fazio and Pete Dye. Enjoy the resort’s southern hospitality and coastal charm, along with convenient access to a variety of popular attractions, shopping destinations, and dining experiences.

Everything needed for a memorable getaway to historic Williamsburg is right here. Take advantage of on-site recreation and endless amenities in a picturesque setting. The well-manicured lawns and pristine lakes make a lovely retreat after a day of adventuring in Colonial Williamsburg.

Just three miles north of historic Williamsburg, Club Wyndham Governor's Green offers easy access to some of Williamsburg's most popular destinations. From historic landmarks and walking trails to wineries, beaches, and artisan shops, experience the charm of one of Virginia's oldest cities. The resort also offers a variety of amenities and events, including painting classes, wine and cheese tastings, muffins and mimosas, ice cream socials, and fun activities and crafts for kids, like sharpie tie-dye, candy bingo, and build-a-buddy workshops.

Take a 360° resort tour.

A Mediterranean-style vacation retreat just one mile from the Las Vegas Strip, the three towers offer exceptional views of the dazzling Las Vegas skyline, desert mountains, and the resort's lush courtyard. Lounge by the resort pool, pick up a coffee from the on-site Starbucks, or grab a bite to eat. Outside the resort, you can enjoy outdoor fun at picturesque locations like the Grand Canyon, Lake Mead, and Red Rock Canyon. Plus, catch the famous fountain show at the Bellagio. Indulge in local cuisine. Or place your bets at popular casinos on The Strip — like Caesars Palace, Harrah's Las Vegas, and Flamingo. Check out the Las Vegas Destination Guide for more area fun.

Take a 360° resort tour.

Furnished in the Colonial style, this resort offers all the modern amenities and activities you could want. Surrounded by the area's top attractions and historic landmarks, there's plenty to explore, ensuring that your getaway is one to remember.

Located just 5 minutes from historic Williamsburg, Club Wyndham Kingsgate provides convenient access to historic attractions, wineries, beaches, and local artisan shops. Relax by the pool or indulge in the natural splendor surrounding this charming resort. Experience scenic vistas and historic landmarks along one of Williamsburg's many walking and biking trails like Powhatan Creek Trail, Historic Jamestown Bike Trail, and Freedom Park, which includes the Williamsburg Botanical Garden and the Go Ape outdoor adventure attraction, with treetop obstacle courses and zip lines.

Located just four miles from Branson’s famous 76 Strip, Club Wyndham Mountain Vista offers convenient access to a variety of outdoor adventures and popular tourist attractions. Experience thrills at Silver Dollar City’s amusement and water parks. Explore the bizarre and unbelievable exhibits and attractions at Ripley’s Believe It Or Not. Take your sightseeing to new levels with zip lines and cave tours. From shopping complexes and trampoline parks to wineries and golf courses, there’s no shortage of fun in Branson. And after a day of exploring, you can take a refreshing dip in one of the indoor or outdoor swimming pools and hot tubs.

Steeped in Southern traditions of hospitality and charm, you’ll want for nothing as you adventure day and night in Music City. Luckily, this warm, friendly resort is close to Nashville’s best music, liquor, and historical landmarks.
Located just one mile from the Grand Ole Opry, Club Wyndham Nashville provides a great base to explore all the middle Tennessee has to offer. Conveniently located near popular destinations like the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum and the Nashville Zoo, you can easily explore all that Nashville has to offer. Plus, take a scenic drive out to the Jack Daniel’s Distillery or explore the shops and restaurants of Green Hills.

Take a 360° resort tour.

Experience a rare blend of Colonial-era tradition and urban excitement. By day, explore modern wonders in bustling metropolitan D.C. By night, step back in time to charming boulevards, rich in historical ambiance. No other timeshare resort comes close to this superb location.

Enjoy a family game night with pool or ping pong, or play your own game on the outdoor patio. Looking to break a sweat? The on-site fitness center is ready for you. Take some time to enjoy the boulevards for some shopping and dining. Or, take in some sightseeing along the Potomac River aboard a water taxi.

Take a 360° resort tour.

Some of the best vacation moments happen when you don’t stick to the plan. Wyndham Palm-Aire is a tropical haven, adjacent to the links at Palm Aire Country Club. It’s jam-packed with a wide array of amenities the whole family will enjoy. So whatever you’re planning to do on vacation — even the unplanned, unexpected things — this resort is ready to accommodate it all. Show off your competitive side with cornhole, bocce ball, or miniature golf for the whole family. Even more competitive? Try your skills at a kickball, basketball, or volleyball tournament. Lounge by the resort pool, enjoy some live music, or give your taste buds a treat at the wine and cheese or ice cream socials. Get creative with wine glass painting, tie-dye, or build-a-buddy. Plus, there's plenty of fun outside of the resort. Raise the stakes at Isle Casino. See if you can get a strike at AMF Bowling, or bask in the Florida sun on the beach.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"FL","streetAddress":"2601 Palm-Aire Drive","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

Plan for the unexpected at this tropical haven.

Built on the lush grounds of a former golf course, this quiet resort community is surrounded by the stunning landscape and historic spirit of Williamsburg. A great retreat any time of year, its central location also provides convenient access to explore all the area has to offer.

Situated just one mile from Williamsburg's historic area, you'll experience history all around you. Enjoy a little retail therapy at charming local shops or the Williamsburg Outlet Mall. There's plenty for outdoor enthusiasts from boating and fishing to water sports in the James and York Rivers. Head out for a fun day trip to nearby Jamestown, Yorktown, or the gorgeous Virginia Beach.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"VA","streetAddress":"220 House of Burgesses Way","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

Revel in rich history while you relax in comfort.

When you want a little bit of everything — mountains, lakes, recreation, and relaxation — all blended up with Southern hospitality, you'll find it here. There's plenty to do (or not do) at this 14,000-acre vacation wonderland set in the scenic beauty of the Ozarks. The great outdoors are calling and are ready for you to explore. Rent an ATV or UTV and ride through the trails. Take things slower with a hike to the top of Sugarloaf Mountain. Back at the resort, barbecue grills are there to help prepare a fun family meal. Plus, the indoor pool is an ideal spot to kick back after a long day.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"AR","streetAddress":"110 Village Lane","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

Discover the scenic beauty of the Ozarks.

","text@ContentType":"text/html","title":"Club Wyndham Resort at Fairfield Bay","yextId":"1000373105","zipcode":"72088"},"/content/dam/wyndham/content-fragments/zurb-club-wyndham/resorts/united-states-of-america/arkansas/fairfield-bay/resort/helpful-hints-club-wyndham-resort-at-fairfield-bay":{"cq:model":"/conf/wyndham-nextgen/settings/dam/cfm/models/content-model","dam:relativePath":"wyndham/content-fragments/zurb-club-wyndham/resorts/united-states-of-america/arkansas/fairfield-bay/resort/helpful-hints-club-wyndham-resort-at-fairfield-bay","jcr:mixinTypes":["dam:cfVariationNode","cq:Taggable"],"jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"
  • Grocery store at resort entrance, plus Hallmark/Sweete Shoppe on site
  • A vehicle is necessary at the resort as most of the amenities are spread out over our beautiful 14,000 acre resort property.
  • Resort is secluded: limited shopping 20 miles away, little nightlife
  • For your convenience, the front desk is open Monday - Thursday from 7 a.m. to 8 p.m. Friday - Sunday from 7 a.m. to 11 p.m. Guest(s) arriving after these hours should contact the front desk to make arrangements.
  • All of the outdoor swimming pools are seasonal, therefore they are open from Memorial Day to Labor Day only.

If you enjoy outdoor beauty, quiet surroundings, and an activity list that never ends, this is your vacation oasis. Located in the lush Cumberland Plateau region of Tennessee, you’ll have 12,700 acres of rolling hills to explore.

At the resort, you can look forward to fun for the whole family with nine walking trails, miniature golf, beaches, boat rentals, golf courses, tennis courts, and more. Around town, explore parks like Cumberland Mountain State Park and Ozone Falls. Stroll through museum exhibits at the Military Memorial Museum and Homesteads Tower. Or sip on local vino at Stonehaus and Chestnut Hill wineries.

From exhilarating winter recreation to summer vacation thrills, there's always something to do at this picture-perfect destination. You can start by discovering the natural beauty of western North Carolina. Whether you seek well-groomed ski runs or the highest waterfall in the East, Sapphire delivers it all — and then some. It's easy to stay active with canoe and kayak rentals, miniature golf, footgolf, tennis, golf, and basketball courts ready for you. If you are looking for a more relaxed vacation, enjoy the indoor and outdoor pools or a trip to a local winery. Discover the natural beauty of Western Carolina on a hike or fishing trip. Or, enjoy history, architecture, and beautiful gardens at the Biltmore Estate.

This resort is located on the banks of the beautiful River Walk and is less than half a mile away from the Alamo. Plus, this historic building has a charm all its own and assures you a friendly, comfortable stay in the heart of downtown San Antonio.

Club Wyndham Riverside Suites is in the heart of San Antonio, a city that blends a rich history, with a vibrant, urban atmosphere. The River Walk features a three-mile cobblestone pathway lined with art galleries, boutiques, and restaurants. Experience thrills at SeaWorld San Antonio or Six Flags Fiesta Texas. If you want a more leisurely activity, enjoy some retail therapy at River Center Mall.

If sun, sand, and water are high on your list, look no further. This resort is a self-contained, indoor-outdoor recreation hub with something for everyone. Join in poolside games and sports, meet new friends at the tiki bar, then walk down the private boardwalk to famed Myrtle Beach where adventure awaits.

Bask in the sun at the pool or the beach. Set out on an adventure with a fishing or boating excursion, kayaking, surfing, or horseback riding. Unwind with a visit to a local winery. Unleash your inner child at nearby miniature golf courses. Or, perfect your swing at any of Myrtle Beach's famed golf courses.

A retreat from the everyday, this mountain resort provides a host of activities to get your heart racing (in a good way). Nearby amusement parks and zoos offer a more exotic way to get your adrenaline going. Maybe your idea of excitement is relaxing poolside or practicing on the greens. Here, you can blaze your own trail.

Relax by the outdoor or indoor pool. Prepare a great family meal with the help of the on-site grill area. Surround yourself with the beauty of America's No. 1 national park destination. Great Smoky Mountains National Park is the ultimate destination for hiking and mountain bike riding. Experience heart-pounding thrills and witness incredible performances at Dollywood. Discover a bevy of live entertainment and activities complete with warm, friendly Southern hospitality.

Take A 360° resort tour.

Timber furniture and stacked stone give this resort a rustic, lodge-like feel, complemented with modern accessories. Step outside your door to explore all the water parks and amenities of Wilderness Resort.

Tucked away in the natural beauty of the Wisconsin wilderness, Club Wyndham Glacier Canyon is connected to nine waterparks and four arcades. When you're not busy tubing and sliding, you can enjoy a variety of local attractions including wineries, casinos, golf courses, wildlife parks, hiking trails, horseback rides, horse-drawn carriage tours, and family fun like zip lining, go-karts, and magic shows. Outlets at the Dells is less than five minutes away and offers a dynamic shopping and dining experience, with something for everyone.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"WI","streetAddress":"45 Hillman Road","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

Step through your door to find water parks galore.

This resort puts you just 100 yards away from laying back on the gorgeous Panhandle beaches of Destin. So it’s a short walk. That is assuming, of course, you can pry yourself away from laying back in the spacious, contemporary-designed suites brimming with the modern comforts of home. Golden sand and turquoise water wait just outside your door. Lounge beachside or by the pool with a front-row view of Florida’s Emerald Coast. In addition to direct beach access, enjoy the resort’s other amenities, including pickleball, tennis, golf, water sports, arts and crafts, and more. Explore Destin’s shopping and dining attractions at HarborWalk Village, The Market Shops at Sandestin, or The Destin Commons. Plus, book local excursions like zip lining, deep sea fishing, and sunset cruises.

Take a 360° resort tour.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"FL","streetAddress":"77 Seascape Drive","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

Along the banks of the Potomac is the innovative National Harbor, a perfect springboard to experience the best of U.S. capital. This resort puts you right at the center of Maryland’s thriving waterfront district. Enjoy National Harbor’s premier shopping and dining options, along with popular attractions like the Capital Wheel, sightseeing cruises, and fishing excursions. Washington D.C. is close by, so you can take a day trip to the nation’s capital and visit iconic landmarks like the Lincoln Memorial and the Washington Monument. Recuperate from your adventures with resort amenities, including an indoor and outdoor pool, LEGO room, Owners Lounge, video game room, billiards room, socials, and more.

Take a 360° resort tour.

Nothing quite says “mountain escape” like a lodge. Even with the beauty and excitement of the Great Smoky Mountains outside, don’t be surprised if you get all your thrills right at this action-packed resort. There’s fun to be had at every turn.

On this perfect Smoky Mountain getaway, you can take in the natural splendor on a scenic hike, bike ride, or horseback ride and enjoy convenient access to local attractions. The on-site waterpark features a variety of activities: indoor/outdoor pools and slides, a video game arcade, miniature golf, laser tag, a ropes course, duck-pin bowling, restaurants and bars, a candy store, a yogurt bar, and even ceramic painting. Plus, you'll be next to an 18-hole golf course and just minutes away from Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg.

Take a 360° resort tour.

  • Please note that the check-in desk is located at Reunion Resort & Club
  • A credit card and a $250 security deposit are required to check into your suite
  • Luggage carts are currently unavailable at the resort. Please contact resort staff for assistance with luggage.
  • There is a fee for packages received by the guest at the resort. Please contact the resort for more information.
  • This resort is cashless, and room charging is not permitted. Debit and credit cards are accepted, and all resort transactions are pay-as-you-go.
  • A suite key or wristband is required for dining and merchandise discounts. Purchases must be charged on a credit card and no retroactive discounts can be made.
  • Restaurant, bar and golf course hours may vary seasonally
  • A car is recommended to fully enjoy the area
  • For your convenience, the resort offers an on-site shuttle that runs 24 hours (on-call). Please contact the resort for more information.
  • We are unable to provide parking for recreational vehicles or trailers on property.
  • Golf Courses are subject to availability and may be closed due to scheduling or maintenance. Priority tee times at Arnold Palmer Legacy and Tom Watson Independence Signature, golf courses, can be made 7-days in advance. For additional information, please contact the Golf Shop at (407) 396-3199. 
  • Miniature golf is available at the resort Wednesday through Sunday. Adult price is $12 and child price is $6.
  • There are no barbecue grills on the property.
  • Access to the waterpark is a maximum of eight people per reservation made.
  • This resort is smoke free and pet free. Not complying with these policies may result in the assessment of a $500 fee.

Famous for its natural scenic beauty, historical towns, and 150 lakes, the Poconos in Pennsylvania has something for every adventurous soul. And this resort has plenty of on-site activities to fuel your vacation fun. Join a friendly game of volleyball or mini golf, then unwind in the swimming pool or hot tub.

Take a 360° resort tour.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"PA","streetAddress":"5255 Buttermilk Falls Road","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

  • Air conditioning

  • Front desk hours: 7 a.m. – 11 p.m.
  • Owners planning on arriving at the resort outside of front desk hours should contact the resort to make alternative check-in arrangements prior to arrival.
  • At least one guest checking in must be 21 years of age or older.
  • There are several villages within the resort, each with different suite styles and slightly different amenity offerings — these villages are Crestview, Depuy, Fairway Village, Ridge Top, River Village I and River Village II.
  • Parking is limited, and the resort is not able to accommodate the storage of boats, RVs, and trailers.

  • A credit card is required for the $250 security deposit requested at check in.
  • Complimentary Wi-Fi is available for up to four devices. Suite amenities may vary by association. 
  • At this time, all wood-burning fireplaces are not operational. Modifications are required and will be made during the next scheduled suite remodel.

The gem of the Grand Strand, Cherry Grove Beach is the number one beach in South Carolina — and it's where you'll find this modern resort. Here, you're just steps away from the gorgeous coastline. And after you explore the oceanfront, it's easy to float the day away on the lazy river.

Play the day away with thrilling beachside activities and water sports like Jet Skiing. Watch the sunrise and enjoy a leisurely day of fishing at Cherry Grove Pier, or reserve a tee time at one of Myrtle Beach's premier golf courses. Back at the resort, lounge by the pool with complimentary ice pops and chilled towels. Show off your competitive side with poolside bingo. Learn some fun facts as you hunt shark teeth and seashells.

Take a 360° resort tour.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"SC","streetAddress":"2100 North Ocean Boulevard","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

This destination getaway is near famed Myrtle Beach, yet secluded enough to feel like a true beach retreat. And this is the resort to choose when you want on-site options. The robust activities program offers days of fun, or you can keep it mellow by the indoor/outdoor pool overlooking the ocean.

Explore 60 miles of coastline offering premier water sports activities and a little something for everyone. The area is a golfer's dream, with championship courses along King's Highway. Enjoy a little retail therapy at the nearby North Strand Plaza Shopping Center, or head a little south to Barefoot Landing and Broadway at the Beach. Spend the day exploring the famed Myrtle Beach Boardwalk or soak up the sun along the beach.

  • Air conditioning
  • Elevators (some buildings)
  • Limited ground floor requests are accepted based on physical or medical needs. Please call the Vacation Planning Center for details.
  • The front desk hours are 7:30 a.m. to 10 p.m.
  • Please note that due to routine cleaning of the hot tubs in chalet suites, owners may experience a delay in hot water on the day of check-in.
  • This resort is a shared-use property. Other associations may allow for different rules. Please follow all guidelines outlined for your club.
  • Parking is limited, and the resort is not always able to accommodate the storage of boats, RVs, and trailers.
  • Pool and hot tub hours are 6:30 a.m.-9:30 p.m. Children who are not fully potty trained must wear swim diapers. There are no lifeguards on duty. Please refer to posted pool signage for more information.
  • The area experiences a high volume of midges (harmless bugs) by the billions from June-Sept.

  • A credit card is required for the $250 security deposit requested at check in.
  • The resort does not allow bicycles, scooters, or skateboards inside the building.
  • No smoking is permitted at the resort.
  • To ensure the preparation of your room meets CLUB WYNDHAM standards, guest services will be happy to accept all check ins beginning at 4 p.m. daily. Please note that early check ins, including that of VIP owners, cannot be accommodated.
  • Valet parking is the only option offered by the resort to park your car during your stay. The per-night cost is $65 for vehicles less than 181 inches, $85 for vehicles over 181 inches in length, or SUVs. Please note that certain large vehicles, such as pickup trucks or large vans, will be charged $105 per night. In and out privileges are available for an additional fee of $15 per re-entrance.
  • Bringing a car on vacation to the Wyndham Midtown 45 at New York City is not recommended. Many visitors to New York choose to use the city's robust public transportation options to enjoy area activities.
  • Luggage delivery service available for a fee through Bags VIP. Visit SkipToTheTrip.com for more details.
  • Wireless Internet is free for up to 4 devices, ideal for emails and basic web browsing. For more streaming and surfing options on unlimited devices, Enhanced High-Speed Wireless Internet is available for $9.95 per day, $49.95 for 6-10 days, and $59.95 for 11-30 days.

This tropical resort is tucked between verdant rainforest and golden sands just 30 miles outside historic Old San Juan. It’s the perfect hideaway to indulge — whether with a round of golf, a delicious spa treatment, some hot casino action, or a spot staked out on the beach with a refreshing boat drink in hand. When the music calls, head to your own tropical oasis. Order a drink from the 5 o'Clock Somewhere Bar so you can sip a salty margarita or a lager by the pool. Delight in the finest rum in Puerto Rico at a tasting. Raise your heart rate with some tennis, or enjoy the island beauty with a round of golf. Relax with some yoga, or take in the stunning grounds on a nature walk. If games are more your speed, they are a plenty including poolside bingo and Jimmy Buffett trivia. Then cool down in your island-themed suite, where more drinks await with the help of your Frozen Concoction Maker.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"PR","streetAddress":"6000 Rio Mar Boulevard","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

  • No air conditioning

  • Front desk hours are from 7 a.m.-10 p.m.
  • If you plan to arrive at the resort outside of normal front desk hours, please call the resort to make alternative check-in arrangements prior to arrival.
  • This property is accessible only by ferry, small plane, or private boat. The ferry ride to Orcas Island from Anacortes is approximately 80 minutes.
  • If you choose to enter and exit Orcas Island via ferry from Anacortes, Washington or from Sidney, British Columbia, you are encouraged to make reservations for both trips before arrival. Please visit Washington State Ferries for more information.
  • The resort is located on a steep hillside, and caution is advised.
  • Due to routine cleaning of the hot tubs in all suites, owners may experience a delay in hot water on the day of check-in.
  • Parking is limited at WorldMark Deer Harbor and the resort is not able to accommodate the storage of boats, RVs, and trailers.
  • Pool hours are 8 a.m. - 10 p.m. Outdoor pool is seasonal, open May 15-Sept. 30 annually. Children who are not fully potty trained must wear swim diapers. There are no lifeguards on duty. Please refer to posted pool signage for more specific information.

  • Air conditioning
  • No elevators
  • Ground floor requests are accepted based on physical or medical need. Please call the Vacation Planning Center for details.
  • Electrical current is 240V/AC50 three-pin, so a converter is required for plug-in items.
  • Credit card signature authorizations are not accepted at Club Wyndham South Pacific locations. If you plan to use a credit card at these locations, please contact your credit card provider prior to traveling to set up your personal identification number (PIN) for payment authorizations.
  • Parking is available on-site.
  • Pool and hot tub hours are 7 a.m.-10 p.m. Children who are not fully potty trained must wear swim diapers. There are no lifeguards on duty. For your safety, please wear shoes in the pool area, and refer to posted signage for more information.
  • PLEASE READ: Effective Monday, July 12, 2021, all owners/guests checking into Club Wyndham South Pacific properties must present photo ID in the form of a passport or driver's license upon check-in. The ID must match the reservation and credit card on file. Guest name must be added to the reservation at time of booking or prior to check-in. Only the Owner Services Team can add or amend a guest name. 
  • There is no longer a business center or waiting room available at this property. 
  • Please be advised that the resort staff will try their best to accomodate room requests, however, these cannot be guaranteed. If you request a room change during your stay, a room cleaning fee will be applied. 
  • Effective April 1, 2022, the Fijian Government has removed the Environment & Climate Adaptation Levy (ECAL) & Service Turnover Tax (STT). 
  • Resort is a three-story walk-up with limited lift access. Ground floor rooms can be requested, but not guaranteed. Lift access is only available to all 2-bedroom Deluxe Garden View and 3-Bedroom Deluxe apartments. 
  • Long term luggage storage is no longer available at this property. Please ensure that you make arrangements for luggage storage if you're leaving between stays or away on an excursion. Storage can only be arranged while you are waiting for your room to be ready, in between room moves, or other short periods of time.
  • Passport is required. U.S. flights arrive at 5 a.m. and depart at 10 p.m. It is suggested you book a suite the night before arrival and the night of departure. 
  • Due to Fiji facing freight and supply chain issues, please be aware that there may be certain items that have increased in price or substituted for other products.

  • No air conditioning
  • No elevators
  • Stairs to most suites
  • 24-hour front desk
  • The third floor is ground level due to the resort being on a cliffside, and the first floor is down two flights of stairs. The first and second-floor suites may have views obstructed by trees.
  • This resort is a shared-use property. Other associations may allow for different rules. Please follow all guidelines outlined for your club.
  • Parking is limited to one vehicle per suite. Vehicles without a parking pass will be subject to towing (not managed by WorldMark by Wyndham). Guests can park in front of the main building. Undercover parking reserved for privately owned suites. The resort can not accommodate the storage of boats, RVs, and trailers.
  • The resort has no pool. The hot tub is located on the second floor and is open from 11 a.m.-10 p.m. year-round. There are no lifeguards on duty. Please refer to posted hot tub signage for more information.
  • The last day for skiing and snowboarding on Whistler Mountain this season is Sunday, April 16. Blackcomb Mountain will be open daily for spring skiing until May 22. Whistler Mountain and Blackcomb Mountain will reopen in Nov. 2023.
  • Sightseeing for Blackcomb Mountain will be open from April 17 to May 22. In addition, Blackcomb Mountain will be open from June 10 to September 24, 2023.
  • Whistler Mountain and Peak to Peak will be open from June 10-Sep. 24, 2023.
  • The bike trails for Whistler Mountain (Village Only) will be open from May 19-Oct. 9, 2023.

Whether you're here for a beach getaway, a family vacation or a business meeting, this resort offers a refreshing blend of warm Southern hospitality, high-tech capabilities and an inviting ambiance. Indulge in beachfront living and take relaxation to the next level with the resort’s airy accommodations, designed with tranquility in mind. Stroll the boardwalk at Pier 60 and watch for dolphins aboard a catamaran or schooner tour. Embrace the city’s casual vibe and ocean breezes while enjoying a vacation that follows your pace. Get ready to relax, work, play, dine and explore the natural beauty of Clearwater Beach.

A welcome oasis along South Carolina’s famed Grand Strand. This friendly resort is a place where you can have fun and reconnect with family away from the crowds on a peaceful stretch of beach. Enjoy the cool Atlantic water just down the coast from Myrtle Beach.

Located near a wildlife sanctuary, there's plenty of opportunity to experience nature during your stay. Myrtle Beach is a golfer's paradise, with some of the world's most challenging golf courses and greens designed by Greg Norman, Jack Nicklaus, and Arnold Palmer. If shopping is your therapy, then you can't miss an outing to the area's fantastic shops including the Tanger Outlets.

","resortDescription@ContentType":"text/html","state":"SC","streetAddress":"1251 Grand Palms Resort Dr","subtitle@ContentType":"text/html","text":"

  • Air conditioning
  • No elevators are available at this resort, and because of its mountainous setting, all suites have exterior and interior stairs.
  • Front desk hours: 7 a.m. – 11 p.m.
  • Owners planning on arriving at the resort outside of front desk hours should contact the resort to make alternative check-in arrangements prior to arrival.
  • At least one guest checking in must be 21 years of age or older.
  • There are several villages within the resort, each with different suite styles and slightly different amenity offerings — these villages are Crestview, Depuy, Fairway Village, Ridge Top, River Village I and River Village II.
  • Parking is limited, and the resort is not able to accommodate the storage of boats, RVs, and trailers.
  • Pool and hot tub hours are 7 a.m.-10 p.m. Outdoor pool is seasonal, open Labor Day through Memorial Day. Children who are not fully potty trained must wear swim diapers. There are no lifeguards on duty. Please refer to the posted pool sign for more information.
  • A credit card is required for the $250 security deposit requested at check in.
  • Complimentary Wi-Fi is available for up to four devices. Suite amenities may vary by association.
  • At this time, all wood-burning fireplaces are not operational. Modifications are required and will be made during the next scheduled suite remodel.

  • The front desk will be closed from 11:00 p.m. – 7:00 a.m. There will only be security staff on site to assist with basic requests or urgent issues. For after-hour check-ins, please contact the resort before arrival.

  • No visitor parking. Parking on property is for registered guests' vehicles only and maximum number of vehicles allowed to be registered per suite varies depending on room type.
  • This resort is now 100% non-smoking. No smoking is permitted in the suites or anywhere else on the resort property, including but not limited to cigarettes, marijuana, cigars, pipes, vaping devices, and other smoking devices.
  • Suites do not have full kitchens.

Find your piece of paradise in Atlanta, Georgia. This sun-kissed metropolis has a heat reminiscent of the islands while bringing its own unique vibe to the table — a cool, hip, no worries feeling that invites you to grab a cold one after a day of exploration. Margaritaville Vacation Club by Wyndham - Atlanta is located in the heart of downtown Atlanta, overlooking beautiful Centennial Olympic Park. Here, you can easily walk to the SkyView observation wheel, unique museums, delicious restaurants, and the iconic Georgia Aquarium. Back at the resort, unwind and take in the city skyline from the lounge, visit the on property Jimmy Buffett’s Margaritaville® Restaurant or chill out at the rooftop pool and bar — with your favorite cocktail in hand, of course.

Gather for adventures in Moab, Utah. You'll stay near some of the best national parks in Utah, including Arches and Canyonland National Parks, where you can hike, bike, and stroll among sandstone arches and dramatic canyons. And, when you're done for the day, head back to this stylish resort where you can relax in the hot tub, cool off in the pool, make s’mores at the fire pit, or watch the sun set over the red rock formations.
